title: Cute fanpic of Rob in London with a fan - Sept.29th
content:
Bunked off school and work for a swim in the sunshine and bam bam sat next to R-Patz by the pool. Boom now time for pizza!! ‪#‎twilight‬ ‪#‎robertpattinson‬ ‪#‎rpattz‬ ‪#‎stalking‬
My daughter and R-Patz today on the roof by the pool at shoreditch house. (neale haynes)
source via source
